revised_title: The Dry Wear of Steels: Patterns and Transitions in Wear Processes
tldr: This study investigates the dry wear behavior of various steels under different loads, sliding speeds, and compositions. Two main types of transitions in wear processes are observed: a change from severe to mild wear, and a change from mild to severe wear. The findings provide a general pattern of wear behavior and help predict the circumstances in which these transitions might occur.
